titleStmt.title: Seuen godly and learned sermons preached by the Reuerend Father in God Iohn Iuel, late bishop of Salisburie. Neuer before imprinted
titleStmt.author: Jewel, John, 1522-1571.
I. K., fl. 1607.

editionStmt.edition: Newly published to the glorie of God, and benefit of his church.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
